## BooleanLiterals type

Helper type to convert boolean array into array of [IBooleanLiteralType](./tscgen.ibooleanliteraltype.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type BooleanLiterals<T extends Readonly<boolean[]>> = {
    [P in keyof T]: T[P] extends boolean ? IBooleanLiteralType<T[P]> : never;
};
```
<b>References:</b> [IBooleanLiteralType](./tscgen.ibooleanliteraltype.md)
